import { React, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import CreateUser from './components/CreateUser' import Login from './components/Login' import Home from './components/Home' import Favorites from './components/Favorites' import { Route} from "react-router-dom"; import Nav from './components/Nav' import axios from 'axios'; import useInput from "./hooks/useInput" import Card from "./commons/Card" const App = () => { const search = useInput() const [fav, setFav]= useState([]) /* */ useEffect(() =>{ axios .get('http://localhost:3001/api/fav') .then((res) => res.data) .then((favorites) => setFav(favorites)) },[]) return (
) } export default App
